body:
{
    "EmailSubject": "Question about retirement savings",
    "EmailBody": "Hi guys,

I was just looking through my 401K.  I have a couple of questions?
 
  Whats a difference between a ROTH and traditional 401K?
Whats the limit for being able to contribute to a 401K every year?
Is there a catchup period for 401K?  Is it 50 years of age.  Is there a required minimum distribution at age 50.
 
 
Thanks,
    John Carnell
"
}
